article_title: Obamacare's Employer Mandate Didn't Help Company Enrollment

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Despite the Affordable Care Act’s controversial requirement that employers provide coverage for workers or face stiff penalties, companies saw “virtually no change” in enrollment growth from 2014 to 2015, a new survey of large companies shows. The survey of nearly 600 employers by Mercer, an employee benefits consultancy, is somewhat surprising given [...]
